Plot: A child molester returns to his hometown after 12 years in prison and attempts to start a new life.
Title: The Woodsman
Writer: Steven Fechter (play), Nicole Kassell (screenplay), Steven Fechter (screenplay)
Actors: Kevin Bacon, David Alan Grier, Eve, Kyra Sedgwick
tomatoConsensus: Kevin Bacon's performance as a pedophile who is trying to start fresh has drawn raves from critics, who have praised the Woodsman as compelling, creepy, complex and well-crafted.
